main_definition: A slang term used to describe an individual who seeks out attractive women, often with a focus on specific body types or features.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Someone interested in adult entertainment featuring large breasted women
meanings_and_examples.example: He was known among his friends as a milfhunter because of his frequent attendance at adult clubs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual who targets attractive women, usually with physical attributes considered appealing by societal standards
meanings_and_examples.example: On the dating app, she received messages from several users labeled as 'milfhunters' due to her appearance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A derogatory term used informally among some individuals, often with a negative connotation and implying objectification
meanings_and_examples.example: His comment about looking for 'milfhunters' at the party was seen as offensive by many guests.
